attributes.action: Petition HM The Queen to Dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming increasingly apparent that some of our Members of Parliament are claiming expenses that do not pass the 'reasonableness test'.   A significant number of the British electorate are day by day becoming more and more angry by this, and feel that some MP's are corrupt and are disillusioned by Parliament. HM The Queen should dissolve Parliament and create a Privvy Council of her own selected individuals, until such time that she can call a General Election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
